name: Mozzie Rolls
description:
Welcome adventurer:

-The gameplay is based on rock (attack), paper (defense), scissors (grab); but you can peform up to 3 actions per turn.

-Each turn you roll 2 action dices and decide if you want to use them, or store any for later.

- Only a max of 3 actions can be stored and you can play them in any order you might wish.
